page.title: 12Geography and Housing
page.content: The castle is an important part of Conisbrough. It has not changed much nor has the church. Across from Donna Maries there is a library being built. Before that it was a square field that had been old Morley Place junior school. The new school was built on Ivanhoe Park. It is still called Morley Place junior school, though it is an new{building}it is an old school. The roads are made for buses, cars, vans and lorries. Some roads are not for lorries or buses over a certain height. There is a low bridge that the buses can't get underneath. The land in our area is quite hilly. Natural{woodland}has been replaced by new housing estates. The{environment has a few small factories, service industries, and a colliery two miles away.
